Chad opposition leader Masra appointed PM of transitional govtChadian opposition leader Succes Masra who recently returned to the central African country following a deal with the ruling junta, was appointed as prime minister of the transitional government, the presidency said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 15:02:52 GMT 4U4H5JSZMZPMHMGOZP34MRXJGM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/chadian-opposition-leader-appointed-pm-transition-2024-01-01/Reuters世界非洲
Hunger hits animals and people alike at Gaza zooIn Rafah zoo, dozens of destitute Gazans are camping between the cages where starving monkeys, parrots and lions cry out for food 12 weeks into Israel's offensive. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 14:11:35 GMT YBD6M6QC7NKHNFRV2OHQHQA4 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/hunger-hits-animals-people-like-gaza-zoo-2024-01-01/Mohammed Salem, Bassam Masoud世界中东地区
Pope denounces continuing crackdown on Church in NicaraguaPope Francis on Monday denounced a growing crackdown on the Catholic Church in Nicaragua by the government of President Daniel Ortega. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 13:13:13 GMT C5RI3D6SAJKY7BXSN37LY6QQQM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/pope-denounces-continuing-crackdown-of-nicaragua-church-2024-01-01/Philip Pullella世界美洲
Iranian warship Alborz enters the Red Sea - TasnimIran's Alborz warship has entered the Red Sea, the semi-official Tasnim news agency reported on Monday, at a time of soaring tensions on the key shipping route amid the Israel-Hamas war and attacks on vessels by forces allied to Tehran. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 12:57:14 GMT 27KLDXSTUBPRVCMO4FFINKOO6U https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/iranian-warship-alborz-enters-red-sea-tasnim-2024-01-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Dutch police arrest more than 200 during New Year riotsDutch police on Monday said more than 200 people had been arrested on New Year's Eve during riots throughout the country, in which dozens of police officers were injured. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 12:01:56 GMT 2VSY34WUNRPRPFT35KJHMNG22I https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/dutch-police-arrest-more-than-200-during-new-year-riots-2024-01-01/Reuters世界欧洲
Pope denounces violence against women as Italy searches soul over murderPope Francis on Monday denounced violence against women, speaking as Italy is in the midst of national soul-searching about how to shed an entrenched culture of male chauvinism that often has led to femicide. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 11:32:01 GMT ITUF672R7VNTJMVYY4YS4NFE7E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-denounces-violence-against-women-italy-searches-soul-over-murder-2024-01-01/Philip Pullella世界欧洲
Thousands of doses of childhood vaccines enter Gaza -Palestinian health ministryThousands of doses of vaccines against childhood diseases including polio and measles have begun entering the Gaza Strip to help deal with a growing health emergency in the besieged enclave, the Palestinian health ministry said on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 11:09:17 GMT CPGAF525SRK2TDFHOTGUQF5TQQ https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/thousands-doses-childhood-vaccines-enter-gaza-palestinian-health-ministry-2024-01-01/Reuters世界中东地区
Nobel Laureate Muhammad Yunus convicted in Bangladesh labour law caseA court in Bangladesh on Monday sentenced Nobel laureate Muhammad Yunus to six months’ imprisonment for labour law violations, prosecutors said, a case his supporters have claimed is politically motivated. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 11:06:04 GMT R4RSHXLEUZO3JJOXDZVN6JNOUY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/nobel-laureate-muhammad-yunus-convicted-bangladesh-labour-law-case-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
Fighting rages in Gaza as Israel looks at new phase of warIsrael pulled tanks out of some Gaza City districts on Monday, residents said, as it announced plans to shift tactics and cut back on troop numbers, but fighting raged elsewhere in the Palestinian enclave along with intense bombardment. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 11:00:32 GMT YH27VTP3L5OSXKXVGADAVLESM https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/fighting-rages-gaza-israel-looks-new-phase-war-2024-01-01/Dan Williams, Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Arafat Barbakh世界中东地区
Iran says it has released Spanish national as a 'humane' stepThe release of a Spanish national detained in Iran was a "humane" step, Iran's Foreign Ministry spokesperson Nasser Kanaani said at a press conference on Monday. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 10:17:06 GMT PH3AUXQINFJH7LGPXKW7D2NMMA https://www.reuters.com/world/iran-says-it-has-released-spanish-national- human-step-2024-01-01/Reuters世界
North and South Korea brace for tsunami after Japan quakeA tsunami measuring under one metre (3.3 ft) reached South Korea's east coast in the wake of a massive earthquake that hit Japan on Monday, South Korea's meteorological agency said, which added there may be more and larger waves in the next hours. Mon, 01 Jan 2024 10:02:50 GMT LVPX742MXNJURNPFTJBVGSS6X4 https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/south-korea-eastern-province-tells-residents-to-evacuate-after-massive-japan-quake-2024-01-01/Reuters世界亚太地区
